text:
The Board of Supervisors finds that residential tenant safety and security in the City and County of San Francisco is an ongoing concern of landlords, tenants, and their neighbors. Residential rental units comprise a significant proportion of housing in the City. The Board further finds that re-keying or replacing entrance door locks on any vacated unit would contribute to safety and security. 
(Added by Ord. 200-07, File No. 070679, App. 8/10/2007)
